firstTimePreamble: ToMCAT here. I’d like to know how you’re feeling. First, can
you use the buttons to tell me briefly how you’re feeling? Then
I’ll ask you to tell me out loud in more detail. Thanks!
recurrentPreamble: Hi again. Can you please tell me how you’re feeling now,
first with the buttons and then out loud? Thanks!
speechAfterQuestions: Thanks! Now, can you tell me out loud in more detail about what
you’re feeling? Take your time and tell me as much as you can.
When you’re done, click the button to move on.

text: How positive are you feeling about the agent right now?
How negative are you feeling about the agent right now?
How positive are you feeling about the mission right now?
How negative are you feeling about the mission right now?
How worried are you that you aren’t doing well in the mission?
How excited are you about the possibility of winning the
How much are you trying to avoid getting hurt or killed
How much are you trying to attack and kill the creatures?
